column2: "Afei frɛ ɛ
column3: Job
column5: kyerɛkyerɛ obi wɔ hɔ a obobua wo a? Na ahotseweefo mu woana na edze bɔkɔ akɛdan no?"

column2: "Osiandɛ ehisɛm ku kwasea
column3: Na nyinkuntwe ku kotobonyi."

column2: "Muhun kwasea dɛ ɔregye ndwow: Na amonmu ara na modoom ne tsenabew."
"Ne mba nye nkwagye ntamu twe
column3: Na wɔpɔtɔw hɔn wɔ kuropon mu
column4: Nkyii so obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔgye hɔn so."

column2: "Nyia ɔkɔm dze no bedzi no ndɔbaa
column3: Na nsoɛ mu mpo na obeyi efi
column4: Na efir da hɔ petoo dze ma hɔn ahodze."

column2: "Na ahohia mmfi huntuma mu mmpue
column3: Nkyii so fona mmfi famu mmfifir;"

column2: "Mbom wɔwo nyimpa ma fona
column3: Dɛ mbrɛ gyansenama so tutu fa sor no."

column2: "Sɛ emi dze a
column3: nkyɛ mobɔhwehwɛ Nyankopɔn n'ekyir kwan
column4: Na medze m'asɛm ahyɛ ne nsa:"

column2: "Ɔno a ɔyɛ ndzɛmba akɛse a onnyi nhwehwɛmu; Anwanwadze a onnyi anobu:"
"Ɔno a ɔma nyankom tɔ gu asaase do
column3: Na ɔma nsu gugu ahaban do:"

column2: "Na ɔdze ahobrɛadzefo sisi mbrɛ ɔkrɔn; Na hɔn a wodzi awerɛhow no
column3: opegya hɔn kɔ eyiedzi mu."

column2: "Ɔno na ɔma enyitseweefo nhyehyɛɛ yɛ kwa
column3: Ma hɔn nsa nntum nnyɛ hɔn esusudze."

column2: "Ɔno na ɔkyer enyansafo wɔ hɔnankasa hɔn enyitsew mu; Na osi ndabrabafo apam tsir adze."
"Wɔtɔ sum mu ewiaber
column3: Na wɔkeka ewiaketee dɛ anadwe."

column2: "Na ɔno na ɔgye nkwa fi afona a ofi hɔn anomu no ano
column3: Mekyerɛ kɔhweaban no fi katakyi no nsamu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hianyi no wɔ enyidado
column3: Na emumuyɛ mua n'ano."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: homkanyi nye nyimpa a Nyankopɔn ka n'enyim: Dɛm ntsi mma mmbu Otumfo ne ntsea no enyimtsia."

column2: "Na ɔtow kam
column3: na ɔkyekyer; Opira

column2: "Obeyi wo wɔ ahohia esia mu; Nyew
column3: dza otsia esuon no mu mpo mbusu bi rennka wo."

column2: "Ɔkɔm ber mu ɔbɛgye wo efi wu mu; Na akodzi mu so ɔagye wo efi afona ano;"
"Ɔbɔkora wo efi tɛkyerɛma mpire ano; Nkyii so irunnsuro ɔsɛɛ a ɔreba."
"Ebɛserew ɔsɛɛ na kɔm; Nkyii so irunnsuro asaase do mbowadoma."
"Na enye haban mu abo bɛyɛ nkyekyeree; Na haban mu mbowadoma nye wo benya asomdwee."
"Na ibohu dɛ w'asesee wɔ asomdwee mu; Na ebɛsera wo nguamban
column3: na erennyew hwee."

column2: "Ibohu so dɛ w'asefo adɔɔ so
column3: Na wo mbanananom bɛyɛ dɛ asaase do nkyɛkyɛr."

column2: "Edze mfe dodow bɔkɔ w'adakamona mu
column3: Dɛ mbrɛ wɔdze ewi efiefi ba wɔ ne ber mu no."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: iyi na yɛahwehwɛ mu ehu
column4: na mbrɛ ɔtse nye yi; Tsie ɛ
column5: na ɔwo so hu fa ma woho."
